org.texgen.signals
Class TextureSignal

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.textures.AbstractChannelSignal
      org.texgen.signals.TextureSignal
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelSignal
public class TextureSignal
extends AbstractChannelSignal

Returns a signal based on the returned value from a texture The returned signal can consist of any of the components (red, green, blue or alpha)

Author:
Andy Gibson
